HOME.TITLE: Daily Health Questionnaire
HOME.QUESTION_ONE: HAVE YOU TESTED POSITIVE OR OTHERWISE BEEN DIAGNOSED WITH COVID-19 WITHIN THE PAST 14 DAYS?
HOME.QUESTION_TWO: Have You Had Any of These Symptoms In The Past 14 Days (SOURCE : CDC)? FEVER, COUGH, SHORTNESS OF BREATH, CHILLS,MUSCLE ACHE, LOSS OF SMELL OR TASTE, HEADACHE OR SORE THROAT
HOME.QUESTION_THREE: Have You Been In Contact With Anyone Displaying COVID-19 Symptoms Or Confirmed To Be COVID-19 Positive Within The Last 14 Days?
HOME.QUESTION_FOUR: Do you agree to abide by Nike's safety precautions including but not limited to social distancing, wearing face coverings and hand sanitizing?
HOME.QUESTION_FIVE: HOW COMFORTABLE DO YOU FEEL WORKING IN TODAY'S ENVIRONMENT AND THE PRECAUTIONS NIKE HAS PUT IN PLACE?
HOME.QUESTION_SIX: Have you or someone in your household tested positive for COVID-19 or are awaiting results within the last 72 hours? (Excluding corporate employees testing for traveling purposes to abide by Nike/DHL’s safety precaution)
HOME.NAME: Name
